name: hairdo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the style in which a person, especially a woman, has their hair cut and arranged, especially if it is unusual or done for a particular occasion: She had a very elaborate hairdo, all piled up on top of her head. Synonyms
coiffure formal
hairstyle
